item.text: So then, my brothers and sisters, dear friends whom I long to see, my joy and crown, stand in the Lord in this way, my dear friends!
I appeal to Euodia and to Syntyche to agree in the Lord.

<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, I <st data-num="2065" class="">say</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1103" class="">true</st> <st data-num="4805" class="">companion</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4815" class="">help</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. <st data-num="3748">They</st> have <st data-num="4866" class="">struggled together</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel ministry</st><n id="2" /> along with <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2815" class="">Clement</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3062" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4904" class="">coworkers</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">names</st> are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="976" class="">book</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.

<st data-num="5463" class="">Rejoice</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st>. <st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st> I <st data-num="3004">say</st>, <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st>!

<st data-num="1097" class="">Let</st> <st data-num="3956 444">everyone</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1933" class="">gentleness</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>!

Do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="3309" class="">anxious</st> about <st data-num="3367">anything</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every situation</st>, through <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">petition</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st>, <st data-num="1107" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="155" class="">requests</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
And the peace of God that surpasses all understanding will guard your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus.

Finally, brothers and sisters, whatever is true, whatever is worthy of respect, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if something is excellent or praiseworthy, think about these things.
And what you learned and received and heard and saw in me, do these things. And the God of peace will be with you.
I have great joy in the Lord because now at last you have again expressed your concern for me. (Now I know you were concerned before but had no opportunity to do anything.)

I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> this <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I am in <st data-num="5304" class="">need</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="3129" class="">learned</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="842" class="">content</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739">any circumstance</st>.

I have <st data-num="1492" class="">experienced</st> <st data-num="5013" class="">times of need</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">times of abundance</st>. <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">any</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> circumstance I have <st data-num="3453">learned the secret of contentment</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">whether</st> I go <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st>, <st data-num="4052">have plenty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">nothing</st>.

I am <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to do <st data-num="3956">all things</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> the one<n id="2" /> who <st data-num="1743" class="">strengthens</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
Nevertheless, you did well to share with me in my trouble.
And as you Philippians know, at the beginning of my gospel ministry, when I left Macedonia, no church shared with me in this matter of giving and receiving except you alone.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2332" class="">Thessalonica</st><n id="1" /> on more than <st data-num="530">one occasion</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> something <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st>.

I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> say this <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I am <st data-num="1934" class="">seeking</st> a <st data-num="1390" class="">gift</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">Rather</st>, I <st data-num="1934" class="">seek</st> the <st data-num="2590" class="">credit</st> that <st data-num="4121" class="">abounds</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">account</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="568">have received</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="4052">have plenty</st>. I <st data-num="4137" class="">have all</st> I <st data-num="4137" class="">need</st> because I <st data-num="1209" class="">received</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1891" class="">Epaphroditus</st> what <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> sentâ€”a <st data-num="2175" class="">fragrant</st> <st data-num="3744" class="">offering</st>, an <st data-num="1184" class="">acceptable</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st>, <st data-num="2101">very pleasing</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="4137" class="">supply</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="4149">riches</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.
May glory be given to God our Father forever and ever. Amen.
Give greetings to all the saints in Christ Jesus. The brothers with me here send greetings.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3122" class="">especially</st> those who <st data-num="1537" class="">belong</st> to <st data-num="2541">Caesarâ€™s</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">household</st>.
The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
